name: Kokatat Hydrus Stance Jacket - Men's
description: A splash top is great to have on hand for wind and weather when you're out kayak touring, canoe tripping and paddleboarding. The Stance jacket is nicely adjustable, and the fabric has a soft hand and comfortable lining.Hydrus 2.5-layer waterproof-breathable fabric is highly packable.Pullover design reduces bulk for great packability.Adjustable coated Lycra© splash collar is comfortable and water resistant.Neoprene cuffs and waistband are both adjustable, with hook-and-loop closures.Zip pocket on sleeve.
